casebody.data:
Dominick PASCULLI, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. Samuel S. LOWE, Deputy Commissioner of the United States Employees’ Compensation Commission and Marra Bros., Inc., a Corporation, Defendants-Appellees. No. 17. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit, Nov. 1, 1937. Nathan Baker, of New York City, for appellant. Lamar Hardy, of New York City, for appellee Samuel S. Lowe, Jeremiah F. Connor, of New York City, for appellee Marra Bros., Inc.

Before L. HAND, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CHASE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Order affirmed.
